title: preussTYPE
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225057/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225057/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : preussTYPE**

[www.preusstype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225057/http:/www.preusstype.com/ "www.preusstype.com")

Ingo Preuss is a German graphic & type designer, living in Ladenburg (outside of Heidelberg). He is the founder and admistrator of [typeFORUM](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225057/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typeFORUM), a German-language typographic discussion forum and news service ( [URL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225057/http:/www.typeforum.de/)).
author: dan_reynolds
